column9: Traditional music in the pub. A talented, and welcoming, group of musicians meet up and play regularly around the district. You’re welcome to just watch and listen, or join in if you want.

Join Vince Cayo at Chip N Ern, Bingley for his album launch - Second Skin. Vince will play his new album start to finish live and it's going to be a treat.
